Title: Police bust fake kidnap gang, rescue 4-year-old victim
Summary: Nigeria Police Force has announced the rescue of a four-year-old girl . The girl was the victim of a staged kidnapping in Katsina State, as part of recent breakthroughs in its ongoing efforts to combat crime across the country .

Title: Starting my career in my 30s helped me build a lasting legacy – Tiwa Savage
Summary: Popular Nigerian singer, Tiwatope Omolara Savage, better known as Tiwa Savage, has said beginning her music career in her 30s was a major blessing that helped her stay grounded and focused . She disclosed this during an interview with Joey Akanji .

Title: Nigerian sprinter, Ofili, switches allegiance to Turkey
Summary: Nigerian sprinter and 150m world record holder, Favour Ofili, has reportedly switched her sporting allegiance to Turkey, just months before . Ofili is a world record-holder in the 150m long and 200m long distance .

Title: 2027: Akpabio hints Fubara, Diri may join APC
Summary: Senate President Godswill Akpabio has suggested that Rivers State Governor Siminalayi Fubara and Bayelsa State Governor Douye Diri may soon defect to the All Progressives Congress (APC) He foresees a broader shift of the South-South region toward the ruling party .

Title: Spain: Hi Ibiza security tried to kill me, Davido alleges
Summary: David Adeleke, popularly known as Davido, has accused security officials at the popular Ibiza nightclub Hi Ibiza of trying to kill him and his team . The singer raised the alarm in the early hours of Sunday via via Twitter .

Title: UN raises alarm over online misogyny
Summary: UN warns toxic digital spaces are influencing real-world attitudes, behaviours and policies . “Manosphere” is a varied collection of websites, blogs and blogs . UN agency dedicated to ending gender discrimination raised the alarm .

Title: Iran foreign minister says US attacks on nuclear sites ‘outrageous’
Summary: Iran's Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi condemned US attacks on key nuclear sites as "outrageous" He said his country has a right to defend its sovereignty .

Title: Why there are unemployable graduates in Nigeria – Prof Alio
Summary: Professor of Vocational Teacher Education, Ngozi Alio, has identified      poor staffing, low level of funds and inadequate training facilities in tertiary institutions as reasons behind unemployable graduates in Nigeria . She equally stated that poor  and static remuneration of technical staff in education sector were part of reasons  behind dearth

Title: Enugu: Police detain suspected firearm repairer, 6 others
Summary: The Police Command in Enugu State has detained a 39-year-old suspected firearm repairer, and six others in a series of intelligence-led operations that led to the recovery of illegal firearms and ammunition . The command’s s spokesman, SP Daniel Ndukwe, disclosed this in a statement .

Title: Building collapsed days after contract revocation in Nasarawa
Summary: Building collapsed days after contract revocation in Nasarawa State Universal Basic Education Board . Contract for building of Smart School quarters in Lafia was earlier awarded by the previous administration .
